transcript:
Customer: Ho mera bhola hai bhandari kare nandi ki sawari

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan? Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Pandey ji ek ek taraf rakhne do baat karne do baat ko.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji. Haan time bata dungi main to cancel connect karwaun.
Executive: Madam connect kya karna hai usko cancel kar kar rakhna hai karo aapko bol to diya.
Customer: To sir aapse baat karte hue reason vagaira to update karna padega na isko woh bhi sir se kis time connect karwaun aap mujhe time bata dijiye sir.
Executive: Nahi to usko cancel karna hai time kya bataunga main.
Customer: Haan to usi ke liye to connect karna hai na sir.

Customer: Aapko phone kar dunga aaj to busy rahunga 3:00 4:00 baj jayenge mere ko 3:00 4:00 aaj.
Executive: 3:00 4:00 baj jayenge.
Customer: To 4:00 baje connect kar lete hain 4:00 baje main bol deti hu sir ko, theek hai?
Customer: Haan phone haan phone kar dunga main aapko.
Executive: Chalo theek hai aap mujhe na WhatsApp message ya call jo bhi hai aap please karoge theek hai?

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to cancel the connection.

- Executive needs time to update the reason.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect at 4:00 PM.

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message or call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- cancellation, connection, time
